summary:
I am a highly motivated and detail-oriented professional with a bachelor´s degree in Pharmacy and a passion for healthcare. I have experience working in fast-paced pharmaceutical environments, always willing to learn new concepts with efficiency and high adaptability.  

HIGHLIGHTS OF MY EXPERIENCE:
➤ Experience working as an intern pharmacist assistant at the largest private health center in Latin America.
➤ Technical oriented, adhering to company´s standards, policies and procedures.
➤ Strong organizational skills and detail-oriented, with a proactive and self-motivated attitude.
➤ Capable of working quickly and accurately under pressure to meet deadlines successfully.
➤ Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and Portuguese.
 
After graduated I lived in Ireland for four years where I  could excel my English skills and I had the opportunity to work in a multicultural environment.
I am looking for an entry level opportunity, to develop my career in the healthcare field.
 
I'm committed to operational efficiency, open-minded, and adapted to work in a multicultural environment.
 
I’m always interested in hearing from former colleagues, managers, or just interesting professionals, so feel free to contact me if you’d like to connect.

profile_positions.description:
PART-TIME ENGLISH STUDENT | INVENTORY SPECIALIST
While I was developing my English language skills I could improve my capacity of working in a multicultural environment.
I also excelled my ability to work swiftly and accurately, exceeded the required productivity targets by always being ahead.
 
Some of my activities:
•   Recorded information, shortages, and discrepancies to keep records current and accurate.
•   Counted stock with a handheld system to provide data to customers.
profile_positions.title: Inventory Specialist

company.name: BP - A Beneficência Portuguesa de São Paulo

profile_positions.company: BP - A Beneficência Portuguesa de São Paulo
profile_positions.description:
PHARMACIST ASSISTANT(Intern) (Hospital Beneficência Portuguesa)
I performed as a Pharmacist Assistant, developing the ability of working accurately and efficiently at the largest private health center in Latin America. With more than 1,000 beds, 7,000 employees, and 3,000 doctors, the institution serves more than 1.8 million people per year, being a reference in medical and hospital care in several specialties, such as Oncology and Cardiology.
 
Some of my activities:
• Organized medications so pharmacists could distribute accordingly- by reading medication orders and prescriptions; preparing labels; calculating quantities.
•  Assisted doctors and health care providers by delivering medication and separating surgery supplies with precision and accuracy.
profile_positions.title: Pharmacy Assistant

profile_positions.description:
PHARMACIST ASSISTANT(Intern) (Drogaria Extrafarma)
I helped health care providers and patients by greeting them in person and by phone; answering questions and requests; referring inquiries to the pharmacist.
In this experience, I was consistently praised for being a fast learner and a professional who is effective, caring and attentive to customer´s needs. In addition to being supportive of the pharmacy´s staff so they could focus on patients´ health.
 
Some of my activities are:
•  Assisted patients in minimizing medical expenses by recommending generic alternative prescribed medications, under pharmacist´s  supervision.
•  Processed and updated medication information into the National Health Surveillance Agency system (ANVISA).
profile_positions.title: Pharmacy Assistant

volunteer_experiences.description: collecting food donation and delivering it to homeless people.
